channel.title: Power Move on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Power Move on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: GM’s Final EV Battery Strategy Copies China’s Playbook: Super Cheap Cells
item.description: General Motors’ homemade version of the low-cost power option favored by China’s auto industry will hit three years before its super-energy-dense tech arrives—and could bring affordable US EVs sooner.
